title: Cohort bar plot error
body:
[API doc link](https://shap.readthedocs.io/en/latest/example_notebooks/api_examples/plots/bar.html#:~:text=bar(shap_values%5B0%5D)-,Cohort%20bar%20plot,-%EF%83%81)

Currently trying to create a cohort bar plot as per example linked above. 

Python version : 3.7
Shap versoin : 0.40.0

Code as below :


```
import xgboost
import shap

### train XGBoost model
X,y = shap.datasets.adult()
model = xgboost.XGBClassifier().fit(X, y)

### compute SHAP values
explainer = shap.Explainer(model, X)
shap_values = explainer(X)
```

executing the example


```
sex = ["Women" if shap_values[i,"Sex"].data == 0 else "Men" for i in range(shap_values.shape[0])]
shap.plots.bar(shap_values.cohorts(sex).abs.mean(0))
```


results in following error :
